sentences.sentence: I fear that they will become confused if I behave idiosyncratically.
sentences.translation: 我害怕他们会搞糊涂，要是我表现得异乎寻常。

sentences.sentence: Personalization is idiosyncratically modal (discussed a bit later in the chapter); people either love it or they don't. You must accommodate both categories of users.
sentences.translation: 个性化是特殊的模态(本章稍后会谈及)，无论人们是喜欢还是不喜欢，你必须容纳这两种类型的用户。
